DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze the expression and activity of inhibitory molecules on eosinophils obtained from allergic subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Inhibitory Receptors in Eosinophils of Atopic Subjects
DOC.criteria: age 2060 years a physiciandiagnosed atopic disease atopic disease not active steroid treatment active nonatopic inflammatory disease, including infections pregnancy
